<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>io.soabase.halva</groupId>

    <packaging>pom</packaging>
    <version>0.2.2-SNAPSHOT</version>

    <modules>
        <module>halva</module>
        <module>halva-processor</module>
        <module>halva-test</module>
    </modules>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>

        <jackson-version>2.7.4</jackson-version>

        <el-version>2.2.6</el-version>
    </properties>

    <name>Soabase Halva</name>
    <description>Idiomatic Scala ... in Java</description>
    <url>https://github.com/randgalt/halva</url>
    <inceptionYear>2016</inceptionYear>

    <organization>
        <name>Soabase Halva</name>
        <url>https://github.com/randgalt/halva</url>
    </organization>

    <licenses>
        <license>
            <name>The Apache Software License, Version 2.0</name>
            <url>http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt</url>
            <distribution>repo</distribution>
        </license>

        <developer>

            <roles>
                <role>Author</role>
            </roles>
        </developer>

    <scm>

        <tag>halva-parent-0.1.1</tag>

            <plugins>

                    <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${maven-javadoc-plugin-version}</version>
                    <configuration>

                        <additionalparam>-Xdoclint:none</additionalparam>

                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-deploy-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${maven-deploy-plugin-version}</version>
                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${maven-release-plugin-version}</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <autoVersionSubmodules>true</autoVersionSubmodules>
                    </configuration>
                    <dependencies>
                        <dependency>

                            <artifactId>maven-scm-provider-gitexe</artifactId>
                            <version>${maven-scm-provider-gitexe-version}</version>
                        </dependency>
                    </dependencies>
                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${maven-compiler-plugin-version}</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <source>${jdk-version}</source>
                        <target>${jdk-version}</target>
                        <compilerArgs>
                            <arg>-Xlint:unchecked</arg>
                        </compilerArgs>

                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-install-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${maven-install-plugin-version}</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <createChecksum>true</createChecksum>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${maven-source-plugin-version}</version>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>attach-sources</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>jar</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${maven-shade-plugin-version}</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <createDependencyReducedPom>true</createDependencyReducedPom>
                        <filters>
                            <filter>
                                <artifact>*:*</artifact>
                                <excludes>
                                    <exclude>META-INF/*.SF</exclude>
                                    <exclude>META-INF/*.DSA</exclude>
                                    <exclude>META-INF/*.RSA</exclude>
                                </excludes>
                            </filter>
                        </filters>
                    </configuration>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <phase>package</phase>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>shade</goal>
                            </goals>
                            <configuration>
                                <transformers>
                                    <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ServicesResourceTransformer" />
                                </transformers>
                                <relocations>
                                    <relocation>
                                        <pattern>com.squareup.javapoet</pattern>
                                        <shadedPattern>io.soabase.com.squareup.javapoet</shadedPattern>
                                    </relocation>
                                </relocations>
                            </configuration>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <groupId>com.mycila.maven-license-plugin</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-license-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${maven-license-plugin-version}</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <header>src/etc/header.txt</header>
                        <excludes>
                            <exclude>**/*.apt</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/*.md</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/*.graffle</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/.gitignore</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/*.json</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/.idea/**</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/DISCLAIMER</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/DEPENDENCIES</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/KEYS</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/LICENSE</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/NOTICE</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/README</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/CHANGES</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/RELEASE-NOTES</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/generated/**</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/test-file.txt</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/assets/**</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/examples/**</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/io/soabase/com/google/**</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/com/company/**</exclude>
                            <exclude>**/StreamFor.java</exclude>    <!-- this is generated and too hard to get the header in -->
                        </excludes>
                        <strictCheck>true</strictCheck>
                    </configuration>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>license</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>check</goal>
                            </goals>
                            <phase>compile</phase>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>

                <plugin>
                    <artifactId>maven-resources-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>${maven-resources-plugin-version}</version>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>

        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>attach-javadocs</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>jar</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-deploy-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-install-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

    <profiles>
        <profile>
            <id>oss</id>
            <build>
                <plugins>
                    <plugin>
                        <artifactId>maven-gpg-plugin</artifactId>
                        <version>${maven-gpg-plugin-version}</version>
                        <configuration>
                            <passphrase>${gpg.passphrase}</passphrase>
                            <useAgent>true</useAgent>
                        </configuration>
                        <executions>
                            <execution>
                                <id>gpg</id>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>sign</goal>
                                </goals>
                                <phase>verify</phase>
                            </execution>
                        </executions>
                    </plugin>
                </plugins>
            </build>
        </profile>
    </profiles>
</project>

# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Overview
Successfully migrated the soabase-halva project from Java 8 to Java 17. All tests pass (70 tests, 0 failures).

## Changes Made

### 1. POM Configuration Updates (pom.xml)

#### Java Version
- Changed JDK version from `1.8` to `17`
- Updated compiler plugin configuration to use `<release>17</release>` instead of `<source>` and `<target>`

#### Maven Plugin Version Updates
- maven-compiler-plugin: 3.5.1 → 3.11.0
- maven-shade-plugin: 2.4.3 → 3.5.1
- maven-source-plugin: 3.0.0 → 3.3.0
- maven-install-plugin: 2.5.2 → 3.1.1
- maven-gpg-plugin: 1.6 → 3.1.0
- maven-release-plugin: 2.5.1 → 3.0.1
- maven-javadoc-plugin: 2.10.1 → 3.6.0
- maven-deploy-plugin: 2.8.2 → 3.1.1
- maven-resources-plugin: 3.0.0 → 3.3.1
- maven-scm-provider-gitexe: 1.9.4 → 2.0.1

#### Dependency Version Updates
- javapoet: 1.7.0 → 1.13.0
- junit: 4.12 → 4.13.2
- jackson-databind: 2.7.4 → 2.17.2
- validation-api: 1.1.0.Final → 2.0.1.Final
- hibernate-validator: 5.2.4.Final → 6.2.5.Final
  - **Note**: Also updated groupId from `org.hibernate` to `org.hibernate.validator`
- javax.el: 2.2.6 → 3.0.4
  - **Note**: Changed groupId from `org.glassfish.web` to `org.glassfish`
  - **Note**: Changed artifactId from `javax.el` to `jakarta.el`

#### New Dependencies
- Added `javax.annotation:javax.annotation-api:1.3.2` to support `@Generated` annotation (removed from JDK 9+)

#### Javadoc Plugin Configuration
- Changed from deprecated `<additionalparam>-Xdoclint:none</additionalparam>` to `<doclint>none</doclint>`
- Added `<source>17</source>` to javadoc configuration

### 2. Source Code Changes

#### Fixed `yield` Keyword Conflict (ForImpl.java)
- **File**: `halva/src/main/java/io/soabase/halva/comprehension/ForImpl.java`
- **Issue**: `yield` became a reserved keyword in Java 14 (for switch expressions)
- **Fix**: Changed `yield(yielder)` to `this.yield(yielder)` in the `yield1()` method (line 95)
- **Reason**: Qualifying the method call with `this.` disambiguates it from the keyword

### 3. Module-Specific Updates

#### halva module
- Added dependency on `javax.annotation:javax.annotation-api` for `@Generated` annotation support

#### halva-test module
- Updated `hibernate-validator` groupId from `org.hibernate` to `org.hibernate.validator`
- Updated `javax.el` dependency:
  - Changed groupId from `org.glassfish.web` to `org.glassfish`
  - Changed artifactId from `javax.el` to `jakarta.el`

## Build Results

```
[INFO] Tests run: 70, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0
[INFO] BUILD SUCCESS
```

All modules compiled and tested successfully:
1. halva-parent (parent POM)
2. halva (main library)
3. halva-processor (annotation processor)
4. halva-test (test module)

## Compatibility Notes

1. **javax.annotation**: The `@Generated` annotation moved from `javax.annotation` (removed in JDK 9+) to `javax.annotation.processing.Generated`. We added the `javax.annotation-api` dependency to maintain compatibility with existing generated code.

2. **Reserved Keywords**: The `yield` keyword introduced in Java 14 required qualifying method calls in the codebase.

3. **Jakarta EE**: The migration from `javax.el` to `jakarta.el` represents the broader Java EE to Jakarta EE transition.

4. **Hibernate Validator**: The artifact was relocated from `org.hibernate:hibernate-validator` to `org.hibernate.validator:hibernate-validator`.

## Testing

The migration was validated by running:
```bash
mvn clean verify
```

All 70 tests passed successfully with no failures or errors.
